entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 1:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
